item.title: Kim add a quote by Erica Jong
item.description: "Beware of the man who denounces woman writers; his penis is tiny and he cannot spell." -- Erica Jong

item.title: Kim add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Kim add a quote by Cheryl Strayed
item.description: "Don't surrender all your joy for an idea you used to have about yourself that isn't true anymore." -- Cheryl Strayed

item.title: Kim add a quote by William Faulkner
item.description: "Talk, talk, talk: the utter and heartbreaking stupidity of words." -- William Faulkner

item.title: Kim add a quote by Warsan Shire
item.description: "I’m not sad, but the boys who are looking for sad girls always find me. I’m not a girl anymore and I’m not sad anymore. You want me to be a tragic backdrop so that you can appear to be illuminated, so that people can say ‘Wow, isn't he so terribly brave to love a girl who is so obviously sad?’ You think I’ll be the dark sky so you can be the star? I’ll swallow you whole." -- Warsan Shire
